pr_title: [FLINK-16033][table-api] Expose catalog lookup function calls in Scala's expression dsl.

timeline.message:
[FLINK-16033][table-api] Expose catalog lookup function calls in Scala's
expression dsl.

timeline.bodyText: How about we integrate the identifierParser into FunctionLookup. DataTypeFactory has also a method that takes (String). I would like to reduce the number of instances that we need to pass around.
timeline.author: twalthr

timeline.message: [FLINK-16033][table-api] Fix loosing function identifier in ExpressionResolver rules

[FLINK-16033][table-api] Parse identifiers in FunctionLookup.

This change effectively enables querying catalogs for catalog functions
with qualified names.
